thread.section_title: Fine Art America Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fine Art America | www.fineartamerica.com
thread.title: Terese Kleczynski
thread.title_full: Fine Art America reviewed by Terese Kleczynski

author: Terese Kleczynski
title: Terese Kleczynski
text:
This was my second purchase from Fine Art America. I have been quite pleased with this company and would highly recommend them. My items are unique and of the best quality.
My first purchase did have a small oversight but Customer Service was willing to accommodate me. I know if I had to contact them again I would feel confident that they would take care of my needs. Mostly, I feel so good purchasing from and promoting artists.
